item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官警告欧洲不要过度依赖美国液化天然气
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，欧洲国家在准备进一步减少来自俄罗斯的供应时，应避免过度依赖美国液化天然气的进口。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said European nations should avoid becoming too reliant on imports of US liquefied natural gas as they prepare to further trim supplies from Russia.】

item.title: 英伟达发布强劲预测，回击人工智能泡沫担忧
item.description: 全球市值最高的公司英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the world’s most valuable company, gave a strong revenue forecast for the current period, helping counter concern that a global surge in AI spending is poised to fizzle.】

item.title: Blackstone、Neuberger 承诺向 Trilantic 基金出资 6 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone Inc.和 Neuberger Berman 将向 Trilantic Capital Partners 的一个多资产延续基金投入至少 6 亿美元，该基金的折扣很低，一直受到无法为新交易筹集资金的其他公司的密切关注。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Neuberger Berman are committing at least $600 million to a deeply discounted multi-asset continuation fund from Trilantic Capital Partners that has been keenly watched by other firms unable to raise money for new deals.】

item.title: 身份验证初创公司 Incode 寻求高达 30 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，身份验证平台 Incode Technologies 公司正在与投资者进行初步谈判，拟融资 1.5 亿至 3 亿美元，估值高达 30 亿美元。【原文：Incode Technologies Inc., an identity verification platform, is in preliminary talks to raise between $150 million and $300 million from investors at a valuation of as much as $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 推出用于套期保值的人工智能债券交易篮子
item.description: Citadel Securities LLC 周三开始为微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）、亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）、Alphabet 公司（Alphabet Inc.【原文：Citadel Securities LLC started making markets for two baskets of corporate bonds issued by Microsoft Corp., Amazon.com Inc., Alphabet Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. on Wednesday, as investors look for more liquid ways to speculate on massive investments in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 航运巨头竞相利用新航线加速中国-秘鲁贸易
item.description: 在中国拥有的一个庞大港口在秘鲁太平洋沿岸开港后，中国与秘鲁之间加速海上贸易的竞争日趋白热化。【原文：Competition to accelerate maritime trade between China and Peru is heating up after a sprawling Chinese-owned port opened along the country’s Pacific coast.】

item.title: Meta AI 的 LeCun 最快将于本周宣布退出并成立新公司
item.description: 据熟悉其计划的人士透露，在 Meta Platforms 公司管理研究实验室的人工智能先驱 Yann LeCun 计划表示，他将离开这家社交媒体巨头，创办一家新公司。【原文：Yann LeCun, an artificial intelligence pioneer who runs a research lab at Meta Platforms Inc., plans to say he will depart the social media giant and start a new company, according to people familiar with his plans.】

item.title: 高盛称，关注美元与美国股市波动的联系
item.description: 高盛集团的策略师们认为，今年以来，美元与美股水平的相关性变化备受关注，但更有趣的联系在于美元与 CBOE 的波动率指数（VIX）之间。【原文：For all the attention paid to the dollar’s changing correlation to the level of US stocks this year, Goldman Sachs Group Inc strategists argue that the more interesting linkage lies between the greenback and CBOE’s Volatility Index, or VIX.】

item.title: Brightline 的初级小额债券跌至 30 美分以下
item.description: 为支持佛罗里达州的私营 Brightline 列车而出售的债务，买家要求更高的收益率，周二有一笔未评级的次级证券以 29.5 美分的低价转手。【原文：Buyers are demanding more yield to hold debt sold to support Florida’s private Brightline train, with one unrated, junior security changing hands at a low of 29.5 cents on the dollar on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西银行倒闭给持有其债务的公司带来动荡
item.description: 在陷入困境的 Banco Master SA 被清算、其首席执行官在一项全面的腐败调查中被捕之后，一些巴西公司正在披露对该公司的风险敞口。【原文：A handful of Brazilian companies are disclosing exposure to Banco Master SA following the liquidation of the troubled lender and the arrest of its chief executive amid a sweeping corruption probe.】

item.title: 英伟达第三季度财报
item.description: Nvidia Corp. 在加利福尼亚州圣何塞举行的 Nvidia GPU 技术大会上的标牌。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Nvidia Corp. signage during the Nvidia GPU Technology Conference in San Jose, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 布洛克预计未来 3 年利润增长将加快
item.description: 杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）领导的支付公司布洛克公司（Block Inc.【原文：Shares of Block Inc. rose about 7% after the payments firm, led by Jack Dorsey, said it expects profit growth to accelerate over the next three years while launching products at a faster clip and doubling down on efforts to integrate its consumer-focused Cash App and merchant payment service Square.】

item.title: 出人意料的掮客搅乱了智利下届政府的执政之路
item.description: 在周日举行的智利总统选举中，两张熟悉的面孔晋级决选，之后，所有人的目光都转向了出人意料的亚军：一位性格多变的局外人，正在成为权力掮客。【原文：After two familiar faces advanced to Chile’s presidential runoff in Sunday’s elections, all eyes turned to the surprise runner-up: a volatile outsider who is emerging as a powerbroker.】

item.title: 劳合社调查已准备加入 AIG 的前首席执行官的行为
item.description: 伦敦劳合社正在调查其前首席执行官约翰-尼尔，他原定于下个月到美国国际集团公司任职，但该公司透露他因 "个人原因 "不再加入。【原文：Lloyd’s of London is investigating its former chief executive officer, John Neal, who was set to start at American International Group Inc. next month before the company disclosed he’s no longer joining due to “personal circumstances.”】

item.title: 美元创三周来最大升幅，因对美联储维持利率的押注上升
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对美联储将保持利率稳定的押注，美元创下三周来最大涨幅。【原文：The dollar jumps the most in three weeks as traders boost wagers that the Federal Reserve will keep interest rates steady.】

item.title: 在逃奥运单板滑雪选手被控谋杀和毒品罪
item.description: 一名加拿大前奥运选手被联邦调查局指控经营世界上最大的可卡因网络之一，现在他的人头被悬赏 1,500 万美元。【原文：A Canadian former Olympian accused by the FBI of running one of the world’s largest cocaine networks now has a $15 million bounty on his head.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要显示 "许多 "官员反对 12 月减息
item.description: 根据联邦公开市场委员会 10 月 28-29 日的会议记录，许多美联储官员表示，在 2025 年剩余时间内保持利率稳定可能是合适的。【原文：Many Federal Reserve officials said it would likely be appropriate to keep interest rates steady for the remainder of 2025, according to minutes of the Federal Open Market Committee’s October 28-29 meeting.】

item.title: 雅培即将收购癌症测试制造商 Exact Sciences
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，雅培实验室正接近收购医疗测试公司 Exact Sciences Corp.【原文：Abbott Laboratories is nearing a potential acquisition of medical-testing company Exact Sciences Corp., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普调侃：如果不降低利率，他将解雇贝森特
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统暗示，如果财政部长斯科特-贝森特不帮助确保降低利率，他将解雇斯科特-贝森特。【原文：President Donald Trump suggested he would fire Scott Bessent if the Treasury secretary doesn’t help secure lower interest rates, a move that is up to the Federal Reserve and not administration officials.】

item.title: 由于美国统计局取消就业报告，交易员几乎将 12 月份的减薪价格定了下来
item.description: 交易员预计，在美国劳工统计局表示不会公布 10 月份就业报告后，美联储更有可能在 12 月份的政策会议上暂缓降息。【原文：Traders expect that the Federal Reserve is more likely to hold off from cutting interest rates at the December policy meeting after the Bureau of Labor Statistics said it will not publish an October employment report.】

item.title: Ackman 房利-弗雷迪计划在白宫推介后股价大涨
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）仍然相信，即使没有大手笔的公开募股，他对房利美和房地美的押注今年也能得到回报。他并不孤单。【原文：Bill Ackman still believes his bet on Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac can pay off this year, even without a blockbuster public offering. He’s not alone.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会停摆后文件积压严重，可能导致美国 IPO 停滞不前
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）的普通员工已经返回岗位，开始处理在美国历史上最长的政府停摆期间堆积如山的文书工作。【原文：Rank-and-file US Securities and Exchange Commission workers have returned to face the paperwork that piled up during the longest government shutdown in US history, and supervisors say the order of the day is “triage.”】

item.title: 美联储研究称，移民速度放缓可能导致未来劳动力缩水
item.description: 根据旧金山联邦储备银行的最新研究，移民的大幅减少可能会导致美国劳动力在未来几年内增长放缓甚至下降。【原文：A significant reduction in immigration could lead the US labor force to grow more slowly or even decline in the coming years, according to new research from the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 出售布宜诺斯艾利斯债券，阿根廷债券总额突破 34 亿美元
item.description: 阿根廷的债券销售热潮已蔓延到公共部门，布宜诺斯艾利斯市在近十年后重返全球市场，使过去三周的外债发行量达到近 35 亿美元，超过了前五个月的总和。【原文：The bond sale spree in Argentina has spread into the public sector, with the City of Buenos Aires returning to global markets after almost a decade and bringing foreign debt issuance to almost $3.5 billion in the past three weeks, topping the volume of the previous five months combined.】

item.title: 加拿大银行警告生产率疲软的 "恶性循环
item.description: 加拿大央行表示，加拿大生产力增长乏力是一个 "系统性 "问题，并加倍向政府和企业发出了紧急解决这一问题的信息。【原文：The Bank of Canada said the country’s anemic productivity growth is a “systemic” problem, doubling down on its message to governments and businesses to urgently address the issue.】

item.title: 美国统计局取消 10 月份就业报告，原因是无法收集部分数据
item.description: 美国劳工统计局（Bureau of Labor Statistics）表示，该局将不发布 10 月份的就业报告，并指出该局将把这些薪资数据纳入定于 12 月中旬发布的 11 月份报告中。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics said it will not publish an October employment report, and noted it will incorporate those payrolls figures into the November report set to be published in mid-December.】

item.title: 沙特 Humain 公司以 40 亿美元的价值支持人工智能视频初创公司 Luma
item.description: 六个月前，沙特阿拉伯推出了一家名为 Humain 的新人工智能公司，该公司承诺将利用沙特王国的巨大资源，成为人工智能领域的强大投资者。现在，Humain 正式披露了其第一笔初创企业投资。【原文：Six months ago, Saudi Arabia unveiled a new artificial intelligence firm called Humain that promised to wield the kingdom’s immense resources and become a powerhouse investor in the AI sector. Now, Humain is officially disclosing its first startup investment.】

item.title: 黑客正在利用人工智能加强勒索软件谈判
item.description: 俄罗斯黑客可没那么有同情心。【原文：Russian hackers aren’t as empathetic.】

item.title: 德国足球队沙尔克用晋级奖金筹集债务
item.description: 德国足球队沙尔克04（FC Schalke 04）将通过私募融资 7500 万欧元（8600 万美元），如果俱乐部升入德国顶级联赛，还将获得利率优惠。【原文：German football team FC Schalke 04 is raising €75 million ($86 million) from a private placement that includes an interest rate sweetener if the club is promoted to the country’s top division.】

item.title: 比特币 "敢死队 "让市场惶惶不可终日，因为杠杆赌注失灵了
item.description: 比特币的反弹从未出现过，现在杠杆交易者被套牢了。【原文：The Bitcoin bounce never came — and now leveraged traders are trapped.】
